general_advisory: To control foot rot disease in paddy spray Metalaxyl 8% + Mancozeb 64% WP. Harvest matured crops like vegetables & pulses and keep them in a safe place. Deworming and vaccination against Foot and Mouth Disease and Brucellosis should be advised in animals. Vegetable seedlings should be transplanted in the afternoon hours. Now the condition is optimum for land preparation and nursery sowing of cauliflower, cabbage, knolkhol, and carrot. Termites may damage crops and vegetables in the present weather condition. Farmers are advised to spray Chlorpyriphos 20 EC.

advisory: False smut: To manage the same, spray Propiconazole or Hexaconazole @ 100 ml or Copper oxychloride @ 250 g in 200 lt of water per acre.
Neck Blast: To control Neck Blast diseases, first drain out excess water from the paddy field. Spray Hexaconazole ml/acre or Azoxystrobin+ Difenoconazole @ 200
